title: [Completed] Unscheduled Maintenance - March 8th, 2024
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 2 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: [Completed] Scheduled Maintenance - February 29, 2024
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 6 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.
